name: Pink Castle World
description:
My First UE5 project! A simple walking simulator based on Unreal Sensei's UE5 Beginer Tutorial

However, my version has some additions like

🏰 I always wanted to pink world so everything is as pink as I can make it

🏰 Has auto day night cycle with the night shortened

🏰 Use a meta human as the 3rd person char

🏰 Invisible walls 

🏰 Press ESC or X to exit game

🏰 Some amusing things like bridge made of water, walk on air, water monument, shiny objects, shiny tree, glass reflections

🏰 Includes 3 areas that has some simple platforming for fun

The video posted here shall show all the areas of interest.

Control are are WASD for movement, SPACE to jump and x or ESC to quit. 
Unzip file to a dir then go into the dir and execute PinkCastleWolrd1.exe

Enjoy! have Fun!
